algs¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Ligand

This class describes a small molecule, by storing info about its identity.

This class is used to define a cluster for use in Aglomerative Clustering.

This class is used to define a cluster for use in PartitionClustering.

This class acts as a base for all clustering algorithms and includes

cluster_similarity(arr, c1_labels, c2_labels, index='jaccard')

This function measures the similarity of cluster 1 and cluster 2
algs.preprocess_data(csv_filename, fingerprint_length=1024)¶

This function preprocess converts the data read in from a csv function with ligand information into a set of ligand class instances.

Parameters

  • csv_filename (str) – Name of csv file for reading in.

  • fp_length (int, optional) – length of fingerprint. Defaults to 1024.

Returns

Set of Ligand class instances.

Return type

ligand_list (list)

algs.generate_fingerprint_array(ligand_list)¶

This function converts a list of Ligand class instances to a numpy array the fingerprints.

Parameters

ligand_list (list) – List of Ligan class instances.

Returns

Numpy array of full-bit fingerprints.

Return type

fp_arr (array-like)

algs.cluster_similarity(arr, c1_labels, c2_labels, index='jaccard')¶

This function measures the similarity of cluster 1 and cluster 2 based on the arr using either the ‘jaccard’ or ‘rand’ index.

Parameters

  • arr (array-like) – input array for clustering

  • c1_labels (array-like) – 1D array of cluster labels.

  • c2_labels (array-like) – 1D array of cluster labels.

  • index (str, default='jaccard') – Index to use must be either ‘jaccard’ or ‘rand’

Returns

Similarity index value.

Return type

sim_index (float)

class algs.Ligand(ligand_id, dock_score, smiles, on_bits, fp_length=1024)¶

This class describes a small molecule, by storing info about its identity.

ligand_id¶

The ligand id.

Type

str

dock_score¶

The docking energy score.

Type

float

smiles¶

The smiles identifier string.

Type

str

fingerprint¶

ECFP Fingerprint of Molecule.

Type

array-like

class algs.AglomerativeCluster(ids)¶

This class is used to define a cluster for use in Aglomerative Clustering.

property ids(self)¶

list: list of ids in the cluster that correspond to row names in the array being clustered.

class algs.KMeansCluster(initial_cc)¶

This class is used to define a cluster for use in PartitionClustering.

property cc(self)¶

array-like: 1D array of size [1, num_features] describing the location of this clusters cluster center.

property data_inds(self)¶

array_like: Array of size [1, num_points] conatining the indices of the data in the input arry that belong to this cluster.

class algs.BaseMetric(metric)¶

This class acts as a base for all clustering algorithms and includes metric functions.

generate_dist_arr(self, arr)¶

This function generates the initial distance matrix for use in the HierarchicalClustering scheme.

Parameters

arr (array-like) – Input array of dimensions elements x features for clustering.

Returns

Initial distance array used in clustering.

Return type

dist_arr (array-like)

cluster_quality(self, arr, cluster_labels)¶

This function calculates the silhouette quality metric after clustering has been performed.

Parameters

  • arr (array-like) – Array that has been clustered.

  • cluster_labels (array-like) – Array of cluster labels from clustering.

Returns

The calculated silhouette quality metric.

Return type

quality_score (float)

class algs.HierarchicalClustering(num_clusters=1, metric='tanimoto', linkage='ward')¶

Bases: algs.BaseMetric

This class implements Hierarchical Clustering and inherets from the BaseMetric class. This class is used for generating clusters using alglomerative clustering.

cluster(self, arr)¶

This function runs the Hierarchical Clustering algorithm and returns labels for each cluster.

Parameters

arr (array-like) – array of dimensions elements x features.

Returns

Labels corresponding to each

input row in arr.

Return type

cluster_labels (array_like)

class algs.PartitionClustering(num_clusters=1, metric='tanimoto', max_iter=1000)¶

Bases: algs.BaseMetric

This class implements Partition Clustering and inherets from the BaseMetric class. This class is used for generating clusters using the K-means algorithm.

initial_cluster_centers¶

Array of initial cluster centers.

Type

array-like

property final_clusters_(self)¶

list: final_clusters_ is a list of KMeansCluster class instances

cluster(self, arr)¶

This function runs the Partition Clustering K-means algorithm and returns labels for each cluster.

Parameters

arr (array-like) – array of dimensions elements x features.

Returns

Labels corresponding to each

input row in arr.

Return type

cluster_labels (array_like)
